A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Even though first movie was a remake\, at least it laid a decent foundation of new characters and backstories (Rey's heritage\, Snoke's rise & Kylo's corruption\, Knights of Ren\, etc). Too bad this movie said \"no thanks\" and went it's own way. Instead we got Finn and Rose (a horrible character the likes of Jar Jar) riding wild space horses through a casino trying to find Benicio del Toro. \n\nLove Star Wars but was seriously disappointed. Any real critic that gave this a good score had to have been pressured by their boss or afraid to cross Disney).
